ese wuwath ape rata athulatha gal anga¬™ru balagara pihita wuwahoth apith pruthiwiya unusum wimata dayaka wena bawa mathaka thaba gatha yuthu ya.ape balashakthi pa‡∑ärashnaya wisandimata punarjananiya balashakthi pa‡∑ärabhawa wadipura sanwardhanaya kala yuthu ya.lowa unusum wima walakwimata apata dayaka wimata athi idakada adu wuwath elesa ho dayaka wima wadagath ya.

gedara genichcha gamanma uyaganna epa moko gewalwala ada wage ayis petti hewath frij thibba ekakya.wadipura thibboth kaha lunu gammiris athagala thambala aran pahuwadata ganna wahala thiyanawa.ehema hadapu lunu uurumas badapu thunapahe dala aatopeta rathuwata hodda hadala gaththama ee kale ape gewalwala thibuna uyanakota suwanda gahana kumbauru hale samba bathuth ekka gawuna thana kanna puluwani.uurumas harakmas uyanawa thiya ada kale gewalwalata ganneth nane.kukul mas witharayi.eda ada wage aagiya athe broyilar kukullu wikunanna thibune na.gan kukullu witharayi kukulek genaweth mangul geyak wage uthsawayak welawata ros karala thiyanna.kotinma eda kukula kiyanne issaraha kamak.mangul gewalwala eda hatti purola iwwe harakmas saha uurumas ada eeke anik paththa.

ruju thindu ganna puluwan nam oya kisi prashnayak me tharam dura diga yanne naha, eth ee thindu ganna bari ee sandaha awashya deshapalana balaya nathi nisa wennath puluwan, eth rata karawana aya danaganna oona minissunta karunu pahadili karala penwa denna, ehema thamanma aadarshayak dunna nam adhi sukhopabhogi wahana suwapahasu wa wenuwata rata gana hithala kapakirim karala pennuwa nam minissu ee anuwa yamin rata hadanna kapakirim karanawa, aanduwata awashya deshapalana balayath labenawa.
ithin apata oonatharan welawa thiyenawa nasthi karanna.
athi wishala rajya sewaya karanne bottuwa wathurata daganimata kalahaki siyalu badaka panawimayi.

ithihasaya diha balanna. 1977di je.aar. wisin maha chandayen path wuna nawa manthriwarunwa wyawastha liyanna balathi kamituwak hatiyata aragena ee hama ekkenagenma parlimenthuwen illa aswenawa kiya assan karapu liyum gaththa.
lamayi tikath ekka athulata gihin api mulinma giya besmant ehemath nathnam polowa yata thattuwa balanna.
budu dahame apata uganwana anithya bawa, jiwithaye athi keti bawa itha sanwediwa idiripath karana mema awasana pada kihipaya apa samata sithimata yamak ithiri karayi.
ee nisa hama thissema hama detama hina wenawata wada hadawathinma hina wenna puluwan nam witharak hina wena eka neda honda.
ehenam api me anathura therum aragena ee anathuren nidahas wenna thiyena upakaraya therum ganna oona.
